name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
February 20: Lesson 5 - One day in Berlin
March 5: Lesson 6 - Talking about the weather
March 12: Lesson 6 - Introducing new grammar: Akkusativ
March 19: Lesson 6 - Positive answer on negative questions, freetime
March 26: Lesson 6 - Review weather, weekend activities, test
April 2: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "können"
April 9: Lesson 7 - Auxiliary verb "wollen", introduction new grammar: Perfekt
April 16: Lesson 7 - Practicing Perfekt, learning languages
April 23: Lesson 7 - Review, test
April 30: Lesson 8 - Jobs and professions
May 7: Lesson 8 - Introduction new grammar: Dativ, talking about the past
May 14: Lesson 8 - Introducing new grammar: Präteritum (verbs haben/sein)
May 21: Lesson 8 - Internship, unusual jobs
May 28: Lesson 8 - Review, test
June 4: Lesson 9 - In a foreign city, auxiliary verb "müssen"
June 11: Introducing new grammar: Imperativ
June 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
